          <title>
            <string language="fr">Périscope</string>
            <string language="en">Periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περισκόπιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Periscopio</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment un rayon de lumière  est reflété par les miroirs à l'intérieur d'un périscope.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a light ray is reflected by the mirrors inside a periscope.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">périscope</string>
            <string language="en">periscope</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein heller Strahl durch
die Spiegel innerhalb eines Periscope reflektiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um raio claro é 
refletido pelos espelhos dentro de um periscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un raggio 
luminoso è riflesso dagli specchi all'interno di un periscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς μια ελαφριά ακτίνα
απεικονίζεται από τους καθρέφτες μέσα σε ένα περισκόπιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un rayo ligero es 
reflejado por los espejos dentro de un periscopio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heller Strahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
